message.name: INF_PRECEDENT_CHANGE_SET_COMPLETE
message.locale: Precedent change set %1n has been marked as complete. During batch processing, the number of further precedent changes identified was: %2n.

message.name: INF_PRECEDENT_CHANGES_UP_TO_DATE
message.locale: The system is now up-to-date with respect to precedent changes queued for batch processing.

message.name: INF_PRECEDENT_CHANGES_RERUN_REQUIRED
message.locale: Another run of the precedent change set batch processing must be scheduled for the system to process these further precedent changes.

message.name: ERR_RNFE_BATCH_SUBMITTED_PRECEDENT_CHANGE_SET
message.locale: There is no precedent change set for batch which has been submitted (but not yet completed).

message.name: INF_PRECEDENT_CHANGE_SET_SUBMITTED
message.locale: Precedent change set %1n has been marked as submitted. The PerformBatchRecalculationsFromPrecedentChangeSet batch process must now be run for each of these dependent types registered in the system:

message.name: ERR_XRV_BATCH_SUBMITTED_PRECEDENT_CHANGE_SET_NOT_YET_COMPLETE
message.locale: Precedent change set %1n cannot be submitted because precedent change set %2n has previously been submitted (but has not yet completed processing).
